languages.text: {n}Иеронимус колеблется. Цвет ушел из его лица, и больше он не похож на ярого проповедника. Перед вами дряхлый испуганный старик.{/n} "Я хочу спорить с тобой, обличить твою ложь, но... Это правда. Инцендия пугает меня. И смерть меня тоже пугает. Но как мне не убояться ее?" {n}Словно завороженный, епископ смотрит на вас, готовясь жадно ловить ваши слова.{/n}

{n}Hieronymus hesitates. The colour has drained from his face, and he no longer has the look of a firebrand. The man in front of you is old, shrivelled, and frightened.{/n} "I want to argue with you, to denounce your lies, but... it is true. Incendia does scare me. As does death. But how do I not fear it?" {n}The reverend seems transfixed as he looks at you, ready to hang on your every word.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Иеронимус колеблется. Цвет ушел из его лица, и больше он не похож на ярого проповедника. Перед вами дряхлый испуганный старик.{/n} "Я хочу спорить с тобой, обличить твою ложь, но... Это правда. Инцендия пугает меня. И смерть меня тоже пугает. Но как мне не убояться ее?" {n}Словно завороженный, епископ смотрит на вас, готовясь жадно ловить ваши слова.{/n}

languages.text: {n}希罗尼穆斯犹豫不决。他脸色的血色已经褪去，不再像个狂热分子一样了。站在你面前的，仅仅是个苍老、干瘪、充满恐惧的老人。{/n}“我很想与你争辩，谴责你的谎言，但……你说得都是真的。因森蒂娅确实让我恐惧不已，死亡也一样，可我怎么能不恐惧呢？”{n}牧师似乎目不转睛地盯着你，准备聆听你的每句话。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus hesitates. The colour has drained from his face, and he no longer has the look of a firebrand. The man in front of you is old, shrivelled, and frightened.{/n} "I want to argue with you, to denounce your lies, but... it is true. Incendia does scare me. As does death. But how do I not fear it?" {n}The reverend seems transfixed as he looks at you, ready to hang on your every word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}希罗尼穆斯犹豫不决。他脸色的血色已经褪去，不再像个狂热分子一样了。站在你面前的，仅仅是个苍老、干瘪、充满恐惧的老人。{/n}“我很想与你争辩，谴责你的谎言，但……你说得都是真的。因森蒂娅确实让我恐惧不已，死亡也一样，可我怎么能不恐惧呢？”{n}牧师似乎目不转睛地盯着你，准备聆听你的每句话。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムスが戸惑う。彼の顔からは色が消え去り、たいまつの炎のような熱さもはやない。あなたの前にいるこの男は老いぼれており、震え、怯えている。{/n}「反論させてもらいたい。嘘を指摘したい。だが…真実なのだ。インセンディアは本当に、恐ろしい。死と同じくらい怖いのだ。だが、死を恐れないなど不可能だろう？」{n}司祭はあなたの言葉に一喜一憂しながらあなたを見つめている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus hesitates. The colour has drained from his face, and he no longer has the look of a firebrand. The man in front of you is old, shrivelled, and frightened.{/n} "I want to argue with you, to denounce your lies, but... it is true. Incendia does scare me. As does death. But how do I not fear it?" {n}The reverend seems transfixed as he looks at you, ready to hang on your every word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムスが戸惑う。彼の顔からは色が消え去り、たいまつの炎のような熱さもはやない。あなたの前にいるこの男は老いぼれており、震え、怯えている。{/n}「反論させてもらいたい。嘘を指摘したい。だが…真実なのだ。インセンディアは本当に、恐ろしい。死と同じくらい怖いのだ。だが、死を恐れないなど不可能だろう？」{n}司祭はあなたの言葉に一喜一憂しながらあなたを見つめている。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus duda. Se ha quedado pálido y ya no tiene aspecto instigador. El hombre que tienes delante es viejo y está consumido y asustado.{/n} «Quisiera discutir y denunciar sus mentiras, pero... es cierto. Incendia me da miedo, al igual que la muerte. ¿Cómo no la temo?». {n}El reverendo parece paralizado mientras te mira, dispuesto a analizar cada una de tus palabras.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus hesitates. The colour has drained from his face, and he no longer has the look of a firebrand. The man in front of you is old, shrivelled, and frightened.{/n} "I want to argue with you, to denounce your lies, but... it is true. Incendia does scare me. As does death. But how do I not fear it?" {n}The reverend seems transfixed as he looks at you, ready to hang on your every word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus duda. Se ha quedado pálido y ya no tiene aspecto instigador. El hombre que tienes delante es viejo y está consumido y asustado.{/n} «Quisiera discutir y denunciar sus mentiras, pero... es cierto. Incendia me da miedo, al igual que la muerte. ¿Cómo no la temo?». {n}El reverendo parece paralizado mientras te mira, dispuesto a analizar cada una de tus palabras.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus zögert. Die Farbe ist ihm aus dem Gesicht gewichen, und er sieht nicht mehr aus wie ein Heißsporn. Der Mann vor dir ist alt, geschwächt, verängstigt.{/n} "Ich will mit Euch streiten, Euch der Lüge bezichtigen, doch ... es ist wahr. Incendia macht mir Angst. Genau wie der Tod. Doch wie sollte ich keine Angst haben?" {n}Der Reverend blickt dich wie gebannt an, bereit, an deinen Lippen zu hängen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus hesitates. The colour has drained from his face, and he no longer has the look of a firebrand. The man in front of you is old, shrivelled, and frightened.{/n} "I want to argue with you, to denounce your lies, but... it is true. Incendia does scare me. As does death. But how do I not fear it?" {n}The reverend seems transfixed as he looks at you, ready to hang on your every word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus zögert. Die Farbe ist ihm aus dem Gesicht gewichen, und er sieht nicht mehr aus wie ein Heißsporn. Der Mann vor dir ist alt, geschwächt, verängstigt.{/n} "Ich will mit Euch streiten, Euch der Lüge bezichtigen, doch ... es ist wahr. Incendia macht mir Angst. Genau wie der Tod. Doch wie sollte ich keine Angst haben?" {n}Der Reverend blickt dich wie gebannt an, bereit, an deinen Lippen zu hängen.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hiéronymus hésite, le visage blême, très loin de l'image de rebelle qu'il dégageait il y a encore quelques instants. L'homme qui se tient à présent devant vous n'est qu'un vieillard rongé par la peur.{/n} « J'aimerais pouvoir vous contredire, mais... vous dites la vérité. Incendia me terrifie, de même que la mort. Mais comment pourrait-il en être autrement ? » {n}Le révérend vous regarde avec intensité, comme suspendu à vos lèvres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus hesitates. The colour has drained from his face, and he no longer has the look of a firebrand. The man in front of you is old, shrivelled, and frightened.{/n} "I want to argue with you, to denounce your lies, but... it is true. Incendia does scare me. As does death. But how do I not fear it?" {n}The reverend seems transfixed as he looks at you, ready to hang on your every word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hiéronymus hésite, le visage blême, très loin de l'image de rebelle qu'il dégageait il y a encore quelques instants. L'homme qui se tient à présent devant vous n'est qu'un vieillard rongé par la peur.{/n} « J'aimerais pouvoir vous contredire, mais... vous dites la vérité. Incendia me terrifie, de même que la mort. Mais comment pourrait-il en être autrement ? » {n}Le révérend vous regarde avec intensité, comme suspendu à vos lèvres.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus tereddüt ediyor. Yüzünün rengi solup o ateşli görünümünü yitiriyor. Karşında ihtiyarlamış, buruş buruş, ürkmüş bir adam duruyor.{/n} "Sana karşı çıkmak, yalanlarını inkâr etmek istiyorum ama... Söylediklerin doğru. İncendia beni korkutuyor. Ölüm de öyle. Nasıl korkmayayım ki?" {n}Donakalan Muhterem, söylediğin her bir şeyi pürdikkat dinleyip sana bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus hesitates. The colour has drained from his face, and he no longer has the look of a firebrand. The man in front of you is old, shrivelled, and frightened.{/n} "I want to argue with you, to denounce your lies, but... it is true. Incendia does scare me. As does death. But how do I not fear it?" {n}The reverend seems transfixed as he looks at you, ready to hang on your every word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus tereddüt ediyor. Yüzünün rengi çekildi ve o ateşli görünümünü yitirdi. Karşında ihtiyar, buruş buruş, ürkmüş bir adam duruyor.{/n} "Sana karşı çıkmak, yalanlarını inkâr etmek istiyorum ama... Söylediklerin doğru. İncendia beni korkutuyor. Ölüm de öyle. Ama nasıl korkmayayım ki?" {n}Muhterem, donakalmış bir hâlde, söylediğin her bir şeyi pürdikkat dinleyerek sana bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
